title: [Large-scale] Intensive Workshop on Engineering Design and Manufacturing Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Engineering Principles and Mathematical Problem-Solving Skills
context.additional_context: Strengthening practical competencies through team-based design-prototyping-testing processes in smartphone-centric restricted technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can define design problems reflecting industrial constraints and derive solutions.
Learners collaborate with team members in resource-limited environments to establish plans for physical prototype fabrication and testing.
Learners apply core manufacturing process principles (strength calculations, material selection, etc.) to actual tasks and evaluate the performance of final outputs.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
